Tender Title: Servicing, Inspection, and Repair of Small Plot Combines
Tender Reference: PW-23-01021626

## Service Description
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada invites interested parties to submit a Statement of Capabilities (SoC) for the servicing, inspection, and repair of Wintersteiger brand equipment at the Lacombe and Brandon Research and Development (R&D) Centres.

## Services Required
The services required include:

* Inspection and identification of broken or near end-of-life parts
* Updating of proprietary computer equipment and software
* Running machine to warm it up and changing fluids and filters (engine oil, hydraulic oil, air filter, etc.)
* Presenting a detailed inspection report

## Equipment to be Serviced
The equipment to be serviced includes:

* Wintersteiger Classic Combine (2010 and 2013 models)
* Wintersteiger Plot Seeder (2017 model)
* Wintersteiger Stationary Thresher (2020 model)
* Wintersteiger Quantum Combine (2022 model)
* Wintersteiger NM Elite (2022 and 2001 models)
* Wintersteiger NM Elite (1996 model)
* Wintersteiger Delta Combine (2011 model)

## Statement of Capabilities
Potential suppliers must submit a statement of capabilities that demonstrates their ability to meet the requirements set out in this notice. The statement must include the following information:

* Authorization and certification to maintain and repair Wintersteiger agricultural equipment
* Details of experience and expertise in servicing and repairing Wintersteiger brand equipment
* Technical specifications and capabilities of the equipment to be used for the services
* Resumes of key personnel involved in the project

## Contract Period and Value
The contract period is from contract award to mid-March 2023. The estimated value of the contract is $91,592.37 CAD (taxes included).

## Notice Type and Posting Date
This is an Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) posted on January 16, 2023. The closing date for the Statement of Capabilities is February 1, 2023, at 14:00 HNC.
